name: Cow Balloon
description:
TOP 1 IN ITALY / TOP 1 IN FRANCE / TOP 1 IN UK

appadvice.com - "The price is low, so you won’t feel like you’ve wasted your money. If you love these types of games, there is no reason you won’t enjoy Cow Balloon as well"

iphonegameruk.co.uk - "I recommend this game to people who like strategy games like angry birds"

findmysoft.com - "Get the app and you will be able to play it on your iDevice and have tons of fun"

Cow Balloon is a fantastic, fun puzzle game you'll have a blast with!

The cows have escaped from the barn and they can't get back on their own. Your objective will be to figure out how to bring the cow back to the barn. But how? To do this, you'll have to roll them, breaking only the brown stones at the right time. You can get help from objects such as bombs, wheels, balloons, magnets, and many more. It's a simple, addictive game where you have to use your intelligence to beat the level.

Journey through 4 worlds and 60 levels! Be fast and get all the stars to get the highest score and challenge other players. Finish each level as fast as you can and you'll rise through the ranks. Many surprises await you! A new adventure for puzzle fanatics!

GAME FEATURES
- Universal game
- 4 worlds with 60 addictive levels!!
- Works with All devices iPhone/iPad iOS 5, 4.3, 4.2, 4.1...
- Game Center support for achievements and leaderboards.
- 34 achievements
- Colorful graphics
- Retina display support.
- Easy controls
- Very addictive!!

FOLLOW US !! @rockerapps
